Author: Strob#3417
Content: In short we notarize BEER, PIZZA and TXSCLCC on KMD. so you need to create wallets for those 4 asset with the same pubkey and wif.

Content: @zatJUM You also have argument in the conf file so you would need to know what's iin there too to see if you are missing anyting like -addnode for example

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content:
install komodo from jl777 dev/FSM branch 
install iguana from the offical repo or mine (if you want more notarizations) 
start BEER PIZZA and TXSCLCC with -pubkey
make wp_776 file and pubkey.txt 
start m_notary_testnet
